CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Data_Bundle__c ,'Data Smart - 800MB'),49, IF(ISPICKVAL(Data_Bundle__c ,'Data Smart Plus - 1.6GB'),99, IF(ISPICKVAL(Data_Bundle__c ,'Data Light - 3.1GB'),189, IF(ISPICKVAL(Data_Bundle__c ,'Data Active - 5GB'),299, IF(ISPICKVAL(Data_Bundle__c ,'Data Heavy - 7.6GB'),449, IF(ISPICKVAL(Data_Bundle__c ,'Data Max - 16.4GB'),899, IF(ISPICKVAL(Data_Bundle__c ,'20GB'),1095, IF(ISPICKVAL(Data_Bundle__c ,'40GB'),2190, IF(ISPICKVAL(Data_Bundle__c ,'80GB'),4096, IF(ISPICKVAL(Data_Bundle__c ,'1Mbps Unlimited'),4000, IF(ISPICKVAL(Data_Bundle__c ,'2Mbps Unlimited'),8000, IF(ISPICKVAL(Data_Bundle__c ,'4Mbps Unlimited'),14000,0))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Data Monthly Fee
